A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This movie sucked big steaming donkey balls. That is how bad it was.  Years ago\, I never believed that Disney could screw up worse than Lucas did with his Jar Jar prequals...then \"The Farce Awakens\" came...and I was in shock.  I was sure that Disney would redeem themselves this time\, but instead they doubled down on stupid and magnified on the lame.. \"The Lost Jedi\" is worse than The Farce Awakens! It's like a curse\, each movie just gets worse!
